prerequisite: Only a vampire can take this paragon path.
name: Vampire Noble
text: You have feasted on innumerable foes and defeated them, all the while holding yourself in the middle ground between mortality and undeath. When you ascend into the paragon tier, your shadow powers grow stronger as you carve out your dark legend.

features.bloodLord(11thLevel): You gain one more use of blood drinker per encounter, but you can still use it only once per turn
features.level11BloodlineFeature(11thLevel): You gain a paragon path feature associated with your bloodline
features.vampiricAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, if you have temporary hit points or have more healing surges than your usual number of healing surges for the day, you gain a +4 power bonus to your next attack roll before the end of your turn
features.bloodlineUtilityPower(12thLevel): You gain a utility power associated with your bloodline
